name: LEGIRION 0.0.5: FIXES
description:
Here's the fifth public demo of my game LEGIRION.

In this version, I added in some settings to the panel tab. There is now a metronome that can play a small blip every tick. You can now change the way that the tiles are distinguished, with the options of none, a hard border, a soft border, or a checkboard pattern.

I also fixed two of the minigames. Into the Pink was difficult since that was designed before prayer drain. I also changed the wave system in the Bigfoots minigame so it is faster to progress through the waves.

LEGIRION is a game heavily inspired by Old School Runescape. It is very much a work in progress.
